Package adrenaline.server.model.constraints

Interface TargetsConstraint

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChargeConstraint, DifferentSquaresConstraint, SameDirectionConstraint, SameRoomConstraint, SameSquareConstraint, ThorConstraint
    public interface TargetsConstraint
    Represents a specific constraint that applies on a collection of targets so that they may be considered valid.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean checkConst​(Player shooter, java.util.ArrayList<Player> targets, Map map)  
      boolean isSpecialRange()  

    • Method Detail

      • isSpecialRange

        boolean isSpecialRange()
        Returns:
        A boolean telling whether this targets constraint should apply on targets that don't comply the range constraints.

      • checkConst

        boolean checkConst​(Player shooter,
                   java.util.ArrayList<Player> targets,
                   Map map)
        Parameters:
        shooter - The player executing the action.
        targets - The collection of intended targets.
        map - The map needed to calculate the constraint application.
        Returns:
        true if the targets comply this constraint; false otherwise
